message: Based on your responses, you are having relatively few difficulties related to your traumatic experience
However, even mild posttraumatic stress can be distressing enough to interrupt your life.
Plus, problems like depression, substance abuse, and anxiety can also happen after a trauma and may not register on a PTSD scale.
While there is no replacement for professional face-to-face care, I can help you learn more about PTSD as well as provide tools for managing your stress as it comes up.
Would you like to take some time now to review some facts about PTSD?
